source.name: Total MARC Trips Taken: Line Chart
source.description: The Governor's strategic goal on transit is to double transit ridership in Maryland by the end of 2020.  Ridership includes bus, metro, rail, and mobility/paratransit services. MTA reports total MARC ridership each month to StateStat.

datasets.name: Total Transit Trips Taken
datasets.description: The Governor's Strategic Policy Goal 8 is to double transit ridership in Maryland by the end of 2020.  Ridership includes bus, metro, rail, and mobility/paratransit services.
